name: The One With Season 1 Quiz | 'Friends' Seasons and Episodes | 25 Questions

questions.text: In "The One with Monica's New Roommate", who was shown singing a song in the subway?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	Phoebe opted out of helping Chandler, Joey and Ross put together furniture so she could sing in the subway. This was only in the DVD. This had nothing to do with the plot so the producers edited out of the episode when it appeared on television.

questions.text: In "The One with the Sonogram at the End", what was not a name suggested for Ross and Carol's unborn baby?
questions.explanation:
Ben.

	In response to the name Helen, Ross says: "Helen Geller?"

questions.text: What was the name of the friend that Phoebe gave $1,000 dollars to in "The One with the Thumb"?
questions.explanation:
Lizzie.

	Phoebe gave Lizzie the $1,000 dollars that she got from the bank because of an error. To make Chandler quit smoking, Phoebe gave him the $7,000 dollars she got from the soda company because of the thumb she found in her drink.

questions.text: At the end of "The One with George Stephanopoulos", what did the guy hand Chandler when he opened the door?
questions.explanation:
Pillow.

	The girls were outside on the balcony talking about old times when Rachel dropped the pillow that was propping her back up. Some guy knocked on their door at the end of the episode and handed Chandler the pillow. Chandler took the pillow and said, "Thanks."

questions.text: In "The One with the East German Laundry Detergent", Phoebe had the worst breakup in the history of the world.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Phoebe and Chandler broke up with their respective paramours at the same time. Phoebe easily broke up with Tony, but Chandler had trouble breaking up with Janice. Phoebe broke up with her for him.

questions.text: At the end of "The One with the Butt", which friend wasn't in the living room while the others sang the song from "Freud!"?
questions.explanation:
Monica.

	At the end of the DVD version of "The One with the Butt", Phoebe and the others began singing Joey's song from "Freud!" while Monica  couldn't sleep thinking about her shoes. On the edited version of the show, the only end scene was Monica in her bedroom.

questions.text: In "The One with the Blackout", who did Phoebe say got bit by a peacock?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	Phoebe was upset because she said she was always the last person to know something. She began listing off the things that she was told last including the peacock and Monica's crush on Joey.

questions.text: Finish this quote: "Dad, we're not burying Nana in a dresser from ______."
questions.explanation:
Ikea.

	Jack Geller and Monica were trying to decide on a casket for Nana. Jack said to find the cheapest casket so Monica named off the cheapest one and then she made the above mentioned quote. "The One Where Nana Dies Twice" is the also the episode in which Monica found out her dad wanted to be buried at sea.

questions.text: On "The One Where Underdog Gets Away", what poster did Joey finally settle on at the end?
questions.explanation:
Winner of 3 Tony Awards.

	Joey was originally on the VD poster as a man named Mario. At the end of the episode, he tore off the bottom of the posters until he came to the one that said "Winner of 3 Tony Awards".

questions.text: Who kissed Chandler at the New Year's Eve party on "The One with the Monkey"?
questions.explanation:
Joey.

	Everyone ended up without their dates during the countdown and Chandler really wanted someone to kiss him so Joey kissed him.

questions.text: Did Monica and Phoebe ever learn the real name of the coma guy in "The One with Mrs. Bing"?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The coma guy was played by David Sederholm. David played David Hyde on "Ryan's Hope" from 1983-1985.

questions.text: What theme song were the friends humming in the beginning of "The One with the Dozen Lasagnas"?
questions.explanation:
Odd Couple.

	After they finished humming the "Odd Couple" theme, Ross started humming the theme from "I Dream of Jeanie". Chandler looked over at him and said, "No, no, no, no, we're done."

questions.text: Who said this line from "The One with the Boobies": "Things sure have changed here on Walton's Mountain."?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	While the gang was in Monica's apartment, Joey said, "Yeah. He's gonna keep cheating on my Ma, like she wanted. My Ma's gonna keep pretending she doesn't know, even though she does. And my little sister, Tina can't see her husband anymore 'cause he got a restraining order-which has nothing to do with anything, except, I found our today." Chandler reacted by saying, "Things sure have changed here on Walton's Mountain."

questions.text: On "The One with the Candy Hearts", what time did the firefighters want to meet Monica, Phoebe, and Rachel?
questions.explanation:
Midnight.

	The three firefighters got off at midnight and that's the only time they could meet the girls. As the guys were walking down the stairs they were talking about not telling the girls they were married.

questions.text: In "The One with the Stoned Guy", ______ said to Phoebe: "Ok. I'm with you, Cheech. Ok."
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Phoebe pulled Rachel over and said, "Smoked a joint? You know, lit a bone? Weed? Hemp? Ganja?" Rachel then said, "OK. I'm with you, Cheech. Ok."

questions.text: Phoebe was wearing the sweater that Joey bought Ursula for her birthday on "The One With Two Parts".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ursula gave Phoebe the sweater that Joey gave Ursula for her birthday. Phoebe wore it when she acted like Ursula to break it off with Joey. Joey didn't know it was Phoebe until he kissed her.

questions.text: At the beginning of "The One with all the Poker", what drink did Joey give Phoebe after she got a paper cut on her tongue?
questions.explanation:
Grapefruit juice.

	A scene only on the DVD version has Phoebe licking envelopes for the resumes when she cut her tongue, "Ooh! Paper cut! Paper Cut!" Joey gave her a drink and after swallowing it she said, "Grapefruit juice! Grapefruit juice!".

questions.text: How many boys did Chandler say in "The One where the Monkey Gets Away" that he went to boarding school with?
questions.explanation:
400.

	Joey was talking about how fun high school was because he got to kiss a lot of girls. Chandler remarked, "Well, I went to boarding school with 400 boys, Any sex I had would've involved a major lifestyle choice."

questions.text: In "The One with the Evil Orthodontist", who did Rachel say taught her how to kiss?
questions.explanation:
Mindy.

	Rachel was telling the gang about Mindy and she said, "We went to camp together... she taught me how to kiss." Joey said, "Yeah?"

questions.text: In "The One with the Fake Monica" who was Monica out to lunch with when her credit card was denied?
questions.explanation:
Judy.

	Monica had just finished telling her mom that she was doing okay when the waiter brought her the credit card back and told her it was denied. Mrs. Geller then handed the waiter her credit card.

questions.text: Do Chandler's co-workers like him on "The One with the Ick Factor"?
questions.explanation:
No.

	When Phoebe and Chandler came into Central Perk after work, Phoebe told Chandler that his co-workers don't like him.

questions.text: In "The One with the Birth", where were Monica and Chandler when Chandler said, "If you find anyone or parts of anyone, scream. Then scream again."
questions.explanation:
Hospital.

	Monica and Chandler couldn't find Ross, Susan, Phoebe or Joey and Chandler said, "There's something sinister going on around here. If you find anyone or parts of anyone scream. Then scream again."

questions.text: In "The One where Rachel Finds Out", what game did Chandler get Rachel for her birthday?
questions.explanation:
Travel Scrabble.

	After opening the present, Rachel handed it back to Chandler. Joey gave her a Dr. Seuss book and Ross gave her a cameo. Monica gave her a sweater which Rachel returned for a skirt.

questions.text: Which two friends were supposed to be the main couple on the show?
questions.explanation:
Monica and Joey.

	In the commentary episode of "The One with Monica's New Roommate", Marta Kaufman was saying that they were going to make Monica and Joey a couple, but saw the sparks between Rachel and Ross and decided to go in that direction.

questions.text: Who was the first actor hired for "Friends"?
questions.explanation:
David Schwimmer.

	The hiring of the "Friends" cast was discussed on the commentary episode of "The One With Monica's New Roommate".
